definition.content: property of a phenomenon, body, or substance, where the property has a magnitude that can be expressed as a number and a reference

notes.content: A reference can be a measurement unit, a measurement procedure, a reference material, or a combination of such.
Symbols for quantities are given in the ISO 80000 and IEC 80000 series Quantities and units. The symbols for quantities are written in italics. A given symbol can indicate different quantities.
A quantity as defined here is a scalar. However, a vector or a tensor, the components of which are quantities, is also considered to be a quantity.
The concept "quantity" may be generically divided into, e.g. "physical quantity", "chemical quantity", and "biological quantity", or "base quantity" and "derived quantity".

origin.clause: 1.1, modified — The Notes have been changed.

definition.content: 숫자와 참조로 표현될 수 있는 규모를 가진 현상, 본질 또는 물질의 속성

Symbols for quantities are given in the ISO 80000 and IEC 80000 series Quantities and units. The symbols for quantities are written in italics. A given symbol can indicate different quantities.
A quantity as defined here is a scalar. However, a vector or a tensor, the components of which are quantities, is also considered to be a quantity.
The concept "quantity" may be generically divided into, e.g. "physical quantity", "chemical quantity", and "biological quantity", or "base quantity" and "derived quantity".

definition.content: sifat bagi fenomena, jasad, atau material, di mana sifat mempunyai magnitud yang boleh dinyatakan dalam bentuk nombor dan rujukan

notes.content: A reference can be a measurement unit, a measurement procedure, a reference material, or a combination of such.
Symbols for quantities are given in the ISO 80000 and IEC 80000 series Quantities and units. The symbols for quantities are written in italics. A given symbol can indicate different quantities.
A quantity as defined here is a scalar. However, a vector or a tensor, the components of which are quantities, is also considered to be a quantity.
The concept "quantity" may be generically divided into, e.g. "physical quantity", "chemical quantity", and "biological quantity", or "base quantity" and "derived quantity".

definition.content: Свойство явления, тела или вещества, где свойство имеет величину, которая может быть выражена как число и ссылка

notes.content: эталоном может быть единица измерения, процедура измерения, эталонный материал или их комбинация.Z754
обозначения для величин приведены в  серии ISO 80000 и IEC 80000  Величины и единицы. Обозначения величин выделены курсивом. Данный символ может указывать на различные величины.
величина, как определено здесь является скаляром. Однако вектор или тензор, компонентами которого являются величины, также считается величиной.
понятие "величина "можно условно разделить на, например," физическая величина"," химическая величина "и" биологическая величина"или" базовая величина"и"производная величина".

origin.clause: 1.1, modified — The Notes have been changed.

definition.content: propiedad de un fenómeno, cuerpo o sustancia, de tal manera que su magnitud  puede expresarse como un número o una referencia

notes.content: La referencia puede ser una unidad de medida, un procedimiento de medida, un material de referencia o una combinación de los anteriores.

Los símbolos de las cantidades se dan en las series de Normas ISO 80000 y IEC 80000 de Cantidades y unidades. Los símbolos de las cantidades se escriben en cursiva. Un símbolo puede indicar diferentes cantidades.
una cantidad tal como se define aquí es un escalar. Sin embargo, un vector o un tensor, las componentes que son cantidades , también se consideran que son una cantidad.
El concepto de "cantidad" se puede dividir genéricamente en, por ejemplo, " cantidad física " , "cantidad química " y "cantidad biológica ", o " cantidad de base" y " cantidad derivada ".

origin.clause: 1.1, modified — The Notes have been changed.
